title: Pencils of plane cubics with one base point
authors: Riccardo Moschetti, Gian Pietro Pirola and Lidia Stoppino
abstract:
We study pencils of plane cubics with only one base point and general member
smooth, giving a complete classification. Under the additional hypothesis that
all members are irreducible, we prove that there exists a unique non-isotrivial
pencil with these properties up to projective transformation. We compare our
construction with the classical approaches given by Gattazzo, Beauville and
Miranda-Persson.
